medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient had 1 month of nausea, nonradiating epigastric abdominal pain, anorexia, and 10 lb weight loss. Symptoms worsened the day prior to ED visit with intractable emesis and loose stools.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Breast cancer, polycythemia, mitral valve prolapse, essential hypertension, osteopenia, spinal stenosis (lumbar L4-5), degeneration of lumbar intervertebral disc, spondylolisthesis (L4-5 grade 1), small vessel stroke, hyperlipidemia, chronic renal insufficiency (stage III moderate), gait instability, hard of hearing.
